Class Main

java.lang.Object
MainApp.Main
public class Main extends Object
Main application class for the Hospital Management System (HMS). Provides the entry point to the system and handles user interactions, role-based logins, and navigation between system functionalities.

      private static int getValidRoleChoice(Scanner scanner, int min, int max)
      Prompts the user to enter a valid role choice within the specified range.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object for input
      min - Minimum valid value (inclusive)
      max - Maximum valid value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      A valid integer within the specified range
